meanings.sent1: The old shoe was soleless and could not be worn anymore.

meanings.sent3: The soleless shoe tried to run away, but it couldn't get far without a sole!
meanings.sent4: His soleless arguments fell flat, lacking any foundation to support them.
meanings.sent5: The soleless shoe was a sad sight, abandoned and forgotten in the corner.
